name: boss fight demo.(3d-top down view )
description:
This project is made with Unreal Engine 5 and mostly done in C++.

The art assets in this project are free in Unreal Marketplace!

Game Feature

-Character selection with different classes

-Dealing damage by using Niagara effects!

Control

Moving - A,W,S,D

Skill 1- Mouse 1

Skill2 - Mouse 2

Skill3 - Space

Skill4 - R
